help.form: Please fill the form in the default language:
help.process_name: Write the name of the process
help.generated_docs: Select the document generated by the process. If there is no matching type, choose 'other'
help.user_tags: Select the user types for which this process is relevant. You can leave this space empty
help.topic_tags: Select the topics related to this process. You can leave this space empty
help.step_name: Choose a name for the step
help.step_location: If the step has a specific location where it must be completed, write it here. You can leave this space empty
help.step_cost: Write here how much it will cost to execute this step
help.required_documents: If the completion of the step requires one or more documents, you can add them via this button. You will then be able to select the type of document and its cost
help.issuer: Write the name of the document type issuer
help.validable: If the document type can be or needs to be validated, check this box
help.validators: Select who can validate this document type from the list
help.doc_type_icon: Select an icon for the document type
help.doc_pics: If there are pictures of the document type, you can upload them here
help.upload_model: If there is a .pdf or .doc model of the document type, you can upload it here
help.user_type: Write the name of the user type
help.user_type_icon: Upload an icon for the user type
help.topic: Write the name of the topic
help.topic_icon: Upload an icon for the topic
help.intervention_type: Write the name of the intervention type
help.intervention_category_type: Select a category for the intervention type
help.integration_type_validators: Select who can validate this intervention type
help.intervention_category: Write the name of the intervention category
help.intervention_title: Write a title for the intervention
help.intervention_assigned_type: Select the type of this intervention
help.intervention_plan_title: Write a title for the intervention plan
help.element_end_date: Select the ending date. Warning: When the end date passes, the content will be unpublished.
help.is_published: Switching the toggle to the right(green) will publish the content as soon as it's saved. Leaving it on the left(white) will save the content and leave it unpublished
help.word_count: Number of words in the description
help.location_maps: Click here to preview the search results of this location on Google Maps
help.location: Write the location of the event
help.pa_username: Write the username that the user will use to login
help.pa_password: Write the password that the user will use to login
help.pa_name: Write the name of the user
help.pa_surname: Write the surname of the user
help.pa_external_id: Write, if avalaible, the external ID of the user
help.pa_admin: Choose if this account will have admin powers
help.pa_mig_tenant: Choose if this account will be a migrant tenant
help.survey_title: Write the title of the survey
help.survey_content: Write the JSON definition of the survey
help.survey_application: Define for which application this survey is destined
help.survey_activation: Decide if you want to activate this survey (this will deactivate any other survey for the same application)
help.survey_activationDate: Set the day when the survey will activate
help.survey_expiryDate: Set the day when the survey will close
help.survey_destinationApp: Set application where the survey will be used
help.parent_topic: Select a parent for this topic. If this topic is a parent, leave the space blank
help.link: Insert the link where you can find more info about the step
help.link_name: Choose a name for the step link
help.event_cost: Price of the event. Mark the checkbox if the event is free.
help.board: if the board does not already exist, it will be automatically created
help.category: if the category does not already exist, it will be automatically created
help.add_step_explain: Click 'Add Step' to add one or more steps to your process
help.click_step_graph: Click on each step to enter details
help.add_edge_explain: Draw lines between steps to link them

input_labels.no_consent: Migrant has not yet given consent

lists.creator: Created by/Organizer
lists.publish_warning: Warning: Publishing the process will make it visible on the migrant app and no changes will be possible before unpublishing. Proceed?
lists.unpublish_warning: Warning: Unpublishing the process mark all existing translations as untranslated and might need to be translated again. Proceed?

link_modal.selected: Select some text to apply a link

success_messages.send_translation: Content has been sent to the translation platform.
success_messages.add_chart_description: Upload succeeded! Please check the corresponding board to see the new chart.

error_messages.title_empty: Title is empty. Please add a title.
error_messages.fill_default_language: Please fill the default language title:
error_messages.in_translation: This content is waiting translation. The edited content will not be saved.
error_messages.change_translated: To edit the content, switch the translation state to Editing. If the content is change to Editing and saved, the current translations will be deleted.
error_messages.date_time_empty: Please fill the start and end dates and times.
error_messages.send_translation: Error while sending to translation platform:
error_messages.add_chart_description_1: Upload failed. Please check if the uploaded file has the correct format and content structure.
error_messages.add_chart_description_2: This Error could also be caused by the server. In this case please contact the system administrator for assistance.
error_messages.add_chart_empty_field_description: Please make sure all required fields are filled.

warning.topic: Warning: Deleting a topic will also delete it from the existing guided processes. Proceed?
warning.user_type: Warning: Deleting an user type will also delete it from the existing guided processes. Proceed?
warning.intervention_type: Warning: Deleting an intervention type will also delete all the interventions of the same tipe. Proceed?
warning.publish_process: Warning: Publishing the process will make it visible on the migrant app and no changes will be possible before unpublishing. Proceed?
warning.unpublish_process: Warning: Unpublishing the process will make it disappear from the migrant app. Proceed?
warning.publish_intervention_type: Warning: Publishing the intervention type will make it visible on the migrant app and no changes will be possible before unpublishing. Proceed?
warning.unpublish_intervention_type: Warning: Unpublishing the intervention type will delete all existing translations. Proceed?
warning.delete_intervention_type: Warning: Deleting an intervention type will also delete all the interventions of the same tipe. Proceed?
warning.publish_doc_type: Warning: Publishing the document type will make it visible on the migrant app and no changes will be possible before unpublishing. Proceed?
warning.unpublish_doc_type: Warning: Unpublishing the document type will delete all existing translations and unpublish all related processes. Proceed?
warning.delete_doc_type: Warning: Deleting a document type will also delete it from all the processes and steps where it appears. Proceed?
warning.publish_intervention_categroy: Warning: Publishing the category type will make it visible on the migrant app and no changes will be possible before unpublishing. Proceed?
warning.unpublish_intervention_category: Warning: Unpublishing the category type will delete all existing translations. Proceed?
warning.delete_intervention_category: Warning: Deleting a category will also delete all the intervention type of that category with their related interventions. Proceed?
warning.publish_topic: Warning: Publishing the topic will make it visible on the migrant app and no changes will be possible before unpublishing. Proceed?
warning.unpublish_topic: Warning: Unpublishing the topic will delete all existing translations. Proceed?
warning.delete_topic: Warning: Deleting a topic will also delete it from the existing guided processes. Proceed?
warning.publish_user_type: Warning: Publishing the user type will make it visible on the migrant app and no changes will be possible before unpublishing. Proceed?
warning.unpublish_user_type: Warning: Unpublishing the user type will delete all existing translations. Proceed?
warning.delete_user_type: Warning: Deleting a user type will also delete it from the existing guided processes. Proceed?
warning.req_fields: You need to fill in the required fields first
warning.delete_plan: Warning: This will delete the plan and all of its interventions. Proceed?
warning.change_pass: The new password and the confirmation password do not match
warning.change_pic: Do you really want to change picture?
warning.published_edit: You can't edit published content. In order to edit you have to unpublish first.

migration_monitor.title: MICADO Migration Situation Monitor
migration_monitor.timescale_checkbox: data related to a time sequence
migration_monitor.timescale_help: Tick this box if you use a time-scale on your category axis (e.g. years, months), leave it empty if you use a nominal or other scale (e.g. countries, cities)
